alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Page (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 12 at 10:15PM CDT until April 13 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN MONTGOMERY AND NORTHEASTERN PAGE COUNTIES... At 1015 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Stuart to 10 miles northeast of Lake Icaria to 7 miles northeast of Clarinda, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Clarinda, Villisca, Hepburn and Viking Lake State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
